<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Add Interface Options to Router</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/routers/{router_id}/create_add_interface_options"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve options for adding an interface to the specified router associated with the instances, identified by its unique ID.
